content: view the pattern online now https //en susudiy com/detail id=1919600038443487234 the crocheting guidance available as following https //youtu be/xg3cfg27jsa **get yarn kit now** shop on susan s family 5% off ship to us&eu https //susudiy myshopify com/products/starlight-couple-cardigan-crochet-yarn-kit **yarn amount** skein s m l south african mohair 4 4 5 lamb wool 5 5 6 alpaca 4 5 5 the crocheting guidance will guide you step by step through completing this project and we hope that during the process you discover even more joy in the colors and stitching techniques used please visit our youtube channel - susan s family to view them you can also find us at https //www instagram com/susansfamily2013/ more product can be found in this account please remember to subscribe & turn on notifications if you d like to know immediately when there s a new video up
